articles.author: Ronny Reyes
articles.title: Gang leader named 'Barbeque' is now most powerful man in Haiti -- as US evacuates Americans - New York Post
articles.description: Some claim that the rifle-wielding 47-year-old mobster’s nickname comes from his penchant for setting his victims on fire
articles.content:
Haiti’s most notorious gang leader, known as “Barbecue,” may be the most powerful man in the nation as the prime minister remains unable to return home.
On Sunday, the US announced that troops had e… [+4531 chars]
